refnamediv.refpurpose: Interface for anything that can save / load itself from a file.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The PersistFile interface is a useful interface for Bonoboizing legacy applications, however, for new / correct applications it is far preferable to implement the BonoboPersistStream interface, since this will not only result in a nice clean to your application architecture, but also allow the transparent use of local, remote, and synthetic streams.

refsect2.title: BONOBO_PERSIST_FILE_TYPE
refsect2.programlisting: #define BONOBO_PERSIST_FILE_TYPE BONOBO_TYPE_PERSIST_FILE /* deprecated, you should use BONOBO_TYPE_PERSIST_FILE */
